welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pierrelaye, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and historical landmarks. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the wonderful things this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for private and business flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals (2A to 2G) serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A small terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Limited free access, with option to purchase premium access for higher speed and longer duration.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal Sud
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal Ouest
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
